text: وما اكثر الناس ولو حرصت بمؤمنين

translations.translation: But most people, for all your eagerness, are not muminun.
Many men will not believe howsoever you wish,
And most of the people, howsoever you might so desire, are not going to believe.
However hard you try, most people will not believe.
And however much you long for, most men will not accept faith.
And most of mankind will not believe even if you desire it eagerly.
And most men will not believe though you desire it eagerly.
Yet, be thou ever so eager, the most part of men believe not.
And though thou try much, most men will not believe.
Yet most men will not become believers, no matter how eager you may be.
And most of the people, though thou desiredest ardently, are not going to be believers.
Yet most people will not have faith, however eager you should be.
Yet no faith will the greater part of mankind have, however ardently thou dost desire it.
And most of mankind will not believe even if you desire it eagerly.
Even though you are so eager, most people will not believe.
But most people, for all your eagerness, are not believers.
And most of the people, although you strive [for it], are not believers.
[12:103] Yet, most people, that is, the people of Mecca, however eager you might be, that they believe, will not believe.
(And though thou try much) no matter how hard you try, (most men) the people of Mecca (will not believe) in the scriptures and messengers.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَمَآ أَكْثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ } الذين يترددون بين يديك { وَلَوْ حَرَصْتَ } بإيمانهم وإذعانهم { بِمُؤْمِنِينَ } [يوسف: 103] لك مصدقين لما جئت به من عند ربك

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: ومن المعلوم الذي لا يخفى على مكذبيك أنك ما لقيت أحداً من الأحبار فتعلمت ذلك منه، فتحققوا أنه وحي من عند الله، ولكن جحدوا { وما أكثرُ الناس ولو حرصْتَ } على إيمانهم، وبالغت في إظهار الآيات لهم، { بمؤمنين } لعنادهم وتصميمهم على الكفر، { وما تسألُهم عليه } على تبليغ هذا النبأ، أو القرآن، { من أجرٍ } كما يفعله حملة الأخبار من الأحْبار
